@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
 .navhover:hover{
     /* background: radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, rgba(0, 125, 255, 0.7), transparent 20%), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, rgba(0, 125, 125, 0.7), transparent 25%), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, white, transparent 30%);
     ; */
     background-color: rgba(146, 103, 255, 0.2); /* Background color with opacity */
-    box-shadow: 0 0 10px 5px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); /* Box shadow with blur effect */
+    box-shadow: 0 0 10px 5px rgba(146, 103, 255, 0.2); /* Box shadow with blur effect */
     border-radius: 5px; /* Optional: Rounded corners for a nicer look */
 }

@@ -4,8 +4,7 @@
 
 .navhover:hover{
     /* background: radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, rgba(0, 125, 255, 0.7), transparent 20%), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, rgba(0, 125, 125, 0.7), transparent 25%), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, white, transparent 30%);

 }
